title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in tent, half cross, chain, running, and encroaching Gobelin stitches in silk;  crossed chain, plaited braid, back, ladder, and chain stitch over double ladder stitches in metal-wrapped silk; wrapping created by over ladder, wrapping over double ladder, and encroaching Gobelin stitching
description: "Spot" sampler with flowers, fragments of repeating pattern, a snail, a deer, a fish, and a falconer.  Traces of original ink drawing can be seen on foundation. Many areas have practice stitches.  Selvedge top and bottom.
name: Sampler
